name: Koala
text:
If your Leader has the {Revolutionary Army} type, this Character gains -4 cost.
[Opponent's Turn] [On K.O] Play up to 1 Character with a cost of 6 or less with the name [Nico Robin] or with the {Revolutionary Army} type other than [Koala] from your hand or trash.

effect.text: If your Leader has the {Revolutionary Army} type, this Character gains -4 cost.
[On K.O] Play up to 1 Character with a cost of 6 or less with the name [Nico Robin] or with the {Revolutionary Army} type other than [Koala] from your hand or trash.
